com.example.shoutout.db

Class ImagesRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.shoutout.db.ImagesRepository

  • public class ImagesRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Repository for storing and retrieving images from a Firebase storage server. Images are automatically renamed to a randomly-generated, and thus anonymous, file name before uploading.
    Since:
    April 29, 2021

      • ImagesRepository

    • Method Detail

      • upload

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<java.lang.String> upload(java.io.File file)
        Uploads an image to the storage server from its file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file pointing to the image to upload
        Returns:
        A task that contains a string. If not null, this this points to the path of the newly-uploaded image and can be retrieved by calling getUri(String) or getStream(String). If null, then the upload was not successful.

      • upload

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<java.lang.String> upload(android.net.Uri uri)
        Uploads an image to the storage server from its file.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI pointing to the image to upload
        Returns:
        A task that contains a string. If not null, this this points to the path of the newly-uploaded image and can be retrieved by calling getUri(String) or getStream(String). If null, then the upload was not successful.

      • getUri

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<android.net.Uri> getUri(java.lang.String path)
        Asynchronously retrieve a valid URI pointing to an image on the storage server.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the image. Initially should be retrieved from upload(Uri) or upload(File)
        Returns:
        A task containing a Uri
        See Also:
        StorageReference.getDownloadUrl()

      • getStream

        public com.google.firebase.storage.StreamDownloadTask getStream(java.lang.String path)
        Asynchronously retrieve a valid stream pointing to an image on the storage server.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the image. Initially should be retrieved from upload(Uri) or upload(File)
        Returns:
        A task containing the stream pointing to the image on the storage server
        See Also:
        StorageReference.getStream()

      • getInstance

        public static ImagesRepository getInstance()
        Retrieve a static, guaranteed non-null instance of this repository.
        Returns:
        A permanent instance of this repository
